net.cnri.apps.dogui.controller

Class DOSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.apps.dogui.controller.DOSearch

  • public class DOSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    DOSearch represents a set of search terms that can include complete phrases, individual keywords, and attributed keywords such as att:author:dickens. A DOSearch can parse and format the search terms without losing the meaning of the search.

      • getNumericRange

        public long[] getNumericRange(java.lang.String attributeName)
        Return the numeric range value for an attribute. The numeric range will be represented as either null (if the attribute doesn't exist or is invalid) or a long array with length of two.

      • getDateRange

        public java.util.Date[] getDateRange(java.lang.String attributeName)
        Return the date range value for an attribute. The date range will be represented as either null (if the attribute doesn't exist or is invalid) or a Date array with length of two.

      • formatDate

        public static final java.lang.String formatDate(java.util.Date dt)
